title: Bobby The Historian: Memorial Day Edition + Lunchbox Trolls A House Auction + Bobby’s Mailbag: Husband Open Wife’s Mail And Discovers Secret
itunes:title: Bobby The Historian: Memorial Day Edition + Lunchbox Trolls A House Auction + Bobby’s Mailbag: Husband Open Wife’s Mail And Discovers Secret
description:
We honor Memorial Day by sharing the many reasons we celebrate along with some historical facts from Bobby. Lunchbox goes to an auction in his neighborhood to raise the price up with no intention of putting in a real bid. Plus, in 'Bobby’s Mailbag' segment, a husband opened his wife’s mail and discovered she has an Old Navy credit card with an outstanding balance. He also learned that when she tried to make the most recent payment it was returned for insufficient funds!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
